name: Witch&Cat
description:
**Update Beta Version 2**

-Fixed the Lava Cave Lava flowing too much.

**************************************************************************

Witch & Cat

Witch & Cat is a 3D, third person, action-adventure RPG which combines Farming Simulation and Platforming in a story rich environment, encouraging the player to casually explore and unlock the secrets around them, all while honing their skills in brewing potions.  

Please participate in our beta test survey here:  https://forms.gle/pMPXgBYUuacd9DBq9

**************************************************************************

Controls

**************************************************************************

Project Description

This is a working project for GAM 651: Prototype Game Development class at Academy of Art University.  Our Team had about 6 weeks to develop this prototype from conceptualization to execution.
